attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that mental healthcare professionals who release a mental patient to kill or rape again be tried along side that mental patient as an accessory before the fact.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Far too many mentally ill people are being released into our society to go and commit the crimes for which they were originally incarcerated, again.  It is only when the healthcare professionals involved are taken into custoy and tried as accessories before the fact will we start seeing mental healthcare professionals acting responsibly towards the safety of the public at large.  Currently they have absolutely no responsibility nor accountability for their massive failures.

rejection.details:
The peition overlaps with several already in exisitence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MentalHealthAct/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
